items.title: Natural Fluid Motion
items.description: Create smooth, realistic animations that maintain the original image style while adding natural movement and dynamics.

faq.title: Seedance 2.0 Image-to-Video ‚Äî FAQ
faq.description: Common questions about Seedance 2.0 image-to-video animation.

items.question: What is Image-to-Video?
items.answer: Image-to-Video is an AI technology that transforms static images into dynamic video animations. Upload any image and the AI will add realistic motion, camera movements, and special effects while preserving the original visual style.

items.question: What image formats are supported?
items.answer: We support all common image formats including JPG, PNG, WebP, and GIF. Images should be at least 512x512 pixels for best results, with higher resolution images producing better quality animations.

items.question: Can I control the animation effects?
items.answer: Yes! You can add supplementary text prompts to describe specific motion effects you want, such as 'gentle breeze moving the leaves' or 'water rippling softly'. The AI will incorporate your descriptions.

items.question: How does intelligent recognition work?
items.answer: Our AI automatically identifies different elements in your image including people, animals, objects, sky, water, and foliage. Each element receives appropriate motion effects based on its nature.

items.question: What video quality can I expect?
items.answer: Animated videos are exported in 1080p Full HD or 2K resolution with smooth frame rates. The AI maintains the original image quality while adding natural, fluid motion effects.

items.question: Can I animate artwork and illustrations?
items.answer: Absolutely! The AI works great with digital art, illustrations, paintings, and graphics. It preserves the artistic style while adding subtle, appropriate animations.

cta.title: Bring Your Images to Life with Seedance 2.0
cta.description: Transform static images into stunning animated videos with Seedance 2.0's AI-powered image-to-video technology. Try free today.
